schemas.copyMessage: You can change attributes, but the new schema must have either a different name or version.

schemas.mustBeDecimal: Must be a 2 or 3-part decimal value like x.y or x.y.z

reservations.checkJunkFolder: (Please check your junk/spam folder before contacting us, as it is very common to have the email delivery problems because of automated filters.)
reservations.emailSentTo: An email has also been sent to {0} with the reservation number below.

reservations.incorrectEmailOrReservationId: Incorrect Email or Reservation ID. Please try again.
reservations.otp: The password is shown below one-time if you need to communicate it via other means
reservations.passwordAvailable: The reservation password is visible below, please use it to complete your check-in.
reservations.passwordValid48Hours: The reservation password is only valid for 48 hours from the time it was sent to your email address.
reservations.requestDeclined: We regret to inform you that your request has been declined.
reservations.requestProcessingTime: It ususally takes 3-4 business days to process a request. Thanks for your patience.
reservations.requestReservedOn: Your request has been received on {0}
reservations.reservationPreviouslyCompleted: This reservation has already previously been completed and the wallet details given out.
reservations.saveWalletIdAndWalletKey: Please save your newly generated wallet id and wallet key in a secure location. You will loose the data once this window is closed or you go back to sign-in. We will never share these information over the email nor do we re-issue upon request.
reservations.sentPasswordOn: We have sent a reservation password to your email address on {0}
reservations.submitNewRequest: If you think there has been an error you can submit a new request again.
reservations.submitted: Your request has been submitted successfully.
reservations.walletIdAndWalletKey: Here is your new Wallet ID and Wallet Key associated with the email address mentioned while registering.
reservations.walletKeyCannotBeRetrievedAgain: The wallet key cannot be retrieved again once supplied. If you require a new wallet you can go back and start a new reservation.

session.countdown: You are going to be logged out in { seconds } seconds...
session.timeoutMessage: Your session has timed out due to inactivity and you have been logged out. Please re-enter your login information.

status.email: Enter your Email Address of request

settings.acapyHelpAutoAcceptInvites: ACAPY_AUTO_ACCEPT_INVITES - Automatically accept invites without firing a webhook event or waiting for an admin request.
settings.acapyHelpAutoAcceptRequests: ACAPY_AUTO_ACCEPT_REQUESTS - Automatically accept connection requests without firing a webhook event or waiting for an admin request.
settings.acapyHelpAutoPingConnection: ACAPY_AUTO_PING_CONNECTION - Automatically send a trust ping immediately after a connection response is accepted. Some agents require this before marking a connection as 'active'
settings.acapyHelpAutoRequestEndorsement: ACAPY_AUTO_REQUEST_ENDORSEMENT - For Authors, specify whether to automatically request endorsement for all transactions. (If not specified, the controller must invoke the request endorse operation for each transaction.)
settings.acapyHelpAutoRespondCredentialOffer: ACAPY_AUTO_RESPOND_CREDENTIAL_OFFER - Automatically respond to Indy credential offers with a credential request
settings.acapyHelpAutoRespondCredentialRequest: ACAPY_AUTO_RESPOND_CREDENTIAL_REQUEST - Auto-respond to credential requests with corresponding credentials
settings.acapyHelpAutoRespondMessages: ACAPY_AUTO_RESPOND_MESSAGES - Automatically respond to basic messages indicating the message was receieved
settings.acapyHelpAutoVerifyPresentation: ACAPY_AUTO_VERIFY_PRESENTATION - Automatically verify a presentation when it is received.
settings.acapyHelpAutoWriteTransactions: ACAPY_AUTO_WRITE_TRANSACTIONS - For Authors, specify whether to automatically write any endorsed transactions. (If not specified, the controller must invoke the write transaction operation for each transaction.)
settings.acapyHelpCreateRevocationTransactions: ACAPY_CREATE_REVOCATION_TRANSACTIONS - For Authors, specify whether to automatically create transactions for a cred def's revocation registry. (If not specified, the controller must invoke the endpoints required to create the revocation registry and assign to the cred def.)
settings.acapyHelpEndorserRole: ACAPY_ENDORSER_ROLE - Specify the role ('author' or 'endorser') which this agent will participate. Authors will request transaction endorement from an Endorser. Endorsers will endorse transactions from Authors, and may write their own  transactions to the ledger. If no role (or 'none') is specified then the endorsement protocol will not  be used and this agent will write transactions to the ledger directly.
settings.acapyHelpInvitePublic: ACAPY_INVITE_PUBLIC - Flag specifying the generated invite should be public.
settings.acapyHelpLogLevel: ACAPY_LOG_LEVEL - Specifies a custom logging level.
settings.acapyHelpMonitorPing: ACAPY_MONITOR_PING - Send a webhook when a ping is sent or received.
settings.acapyHelpNotifyRevocation: ACAPY_NOTIFY_REVOCATION - Specifies that aca-py will notify credential recipients when revoking a credential it issued.
settings.acapyHelpPublicInvites: ACAPY_PUBLIC_INVITES - Send invitations out using the public DID for the agent, and receive connection requests solicited by invitations which use the public DID. Default

settings.canBecomeIssuer: Tenant can become issuer, i.e connect to endorser and register DID
settings.canConnectEndorser: Tenant allowed to connect to Endorser
settings.canRegisterDid: Tenant allowed to register public DID

verifier.presentationShouldHaveStatus: This is not the component you are looking for, presentation should have status='verified'

verify.autoVerifyHelp: Verifier choice to auto-verify proof presentation
verify.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this Presentation Exchange Record?
